content:
# The nearest stone resource is located at position (-14.5, -14.5).
# Let's move to this position and harvest some stone to gather the necessary materials for crafting the stone furnace.

move_to(stone_position)  # Move to the stone position.
harvest_resource(stone_position, quantity=10)  # Harvest 10 units of stone.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")
